title: 86x4: Outside Earned Income, Book Contracts, and Part-Time Teaching Positions
summary:
The outside earned income limitation does not affect an employee’s book contract and part-time teaching position where the employee did not serve in a position to which the limitation applied. However, such activity may be restricted by other standards of conducts and regulations.  

Notes: [cites former 5 U.S.C. app. § 210 and 5 C.F.R. part 735]
